p: The Patanjali Research Institute (PRI) is an autonomous, nonprofitable organization, governed by the Patanjali Research Foundation Trust, Haridwar, India. PRI is not affiliated with or directed by any commercial interest owned by Patanjali Ayurveda Limited, Haridwar, India. Author AB holds an additional nonprofitable management position in Patanjali Ayurveda Limited, Haridwar, India.
